sources.name: SrcUnCrime
sources.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		{Sub Region} as string,
		Country as string,
		Count as string,
		Rate as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName') ~> SrcUnCrime

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SrcUnCrime sink(input(
		FileName as string,
		Region as string,
		SubRegion as string,
		Country as string,
		Count as string,
		Rate as string,
		Year as string,
		sysETLrunId as integer,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysCreatedBy as integer,
		sysChangedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		FileName,
		Region,
		SubRegion = {Sub Region},
		Country,
		Count,
		Rate,
		Year
	),
	truncate:true) ~> sink1
